name: User selects applicable data items and the format of the attestations
scenarioId: android/Web-Verifier_UI_Rework_106/Restructure_web_verifier_to_ease_the_generation_of_presentation_requests_105/RestructureWebVerifierCrossDevice:User selects applicable data items and the format of the attestations
methodName: User selects applicable data items and the format of the attestations

testSteps.description: Given the user has selected a multiple option
When the user indicates that they want to choose specific attributes in the attestations they desire
And the user selects the format of the attestations
Then the verifier saves the selected options
And the user clicks on the next button

userStory.narrative:
As a User,
  I want the EUDIW web verifier to guide me through in the generation of presentation requests
  so that I can generate presentation requests as per my needs.

title: User selects applicable data items and the format of the attestations
